info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 5:37PM CDT until July 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS St Louis MO
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Illinois, including the following county, northwestern Madison.
* WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 537 PM CDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Alton, Edwardsville, Godfrey, Glen Carbon, Wood River, Bethalto, East Alton, South Roxana, Roxana, Hartford, West Alton, Rosewood Heights, Carpenter, Poag and Mitchell. - This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois near exit 23.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
